name: Soldiers Lost Forever (1914-1918)
description: Soldiers Lost Forever (1914-1918) is a World War 1 top down 2D shooter where armies battle it out in the trenches and fight for control of the battlefield.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/ Windows 8/ Windows 10 Processor: 2.2 Ghz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 256 Mb Storage: 80 MB available space
